notes.text: Graduate-level mathematics and statistics coursework supporting machine learning research.

items.title: MATH 525 - Statistics I
items.subtitle: Essentials of statistics with emphasis on data science, covering statistical modeling, Bayesian inference and computation, and approaches used in machine learning and data analysis.

items.title: MATH 526 - Statistics II
items.subtitle: Advanced statistical methods building on Statistics I, covering multivariate analysis, experimental design, nonparametric methods, and advanced regression techniques.
